dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Class SWTWidgetLayoutData

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.SWTWidgetLayoutData

  • public class SWTWidgetLayoutData
extends java.lang.Object
    This layout data is used for widgets of the guided configuration. This layout data allows to provide layout information for the horizontal/vertical layout functionality of SWTGroupController. The SWTWidgetLayoutData can be added to custom widgets via: 
     widget.setLayoutData(new SWTWidgetData(verticalLayout, horizontalLayout));

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

    • Constructor Detail

      • SWTWidgetLayoutData

        public SWTWidgetLayoutData()
        Default constructor.

        Sets a default layouting of:

        Horizontal: 
         GridData(SWT.BEGINNING, SWT.CENTER, false, false, 1, 1)
        Vertical: 
         GridData(SWT.BEGINNING, SWT.CENTER, false, false, 3, 1)
        Since:
        2008.b

        Constructor with layout information.
        Parameters:
        verticalLayout - layout data fro vertical layout (null for default)
        horizontalLayout - layout data fro horizontal layout (null for default )

        2008.b
